reviews.review: Не стоит своих денег, но последние обновления топ
nice game i love ply csgo
syntes at det begynder at blive mere spændene

I really love counterstrike very much. Play it since beta 6.0 - which was released at the beginning of year 2000. I have always played CS competive very successfully. Of course, I would CSGO give a good rating, but the game is just as cheater contaminated as Pubg. If there were no hackers, it would be one of the best shooters on the market. VAC brings unfortunately nothing. Conclusion: Good shooter but too many hackers. :-D
you might think its fun while youre playing it, but when you stop and look back on it you will regret it
